name: Illuminatus: Episodes 1 & 2
description: This is the first and second episodes in the megawad Illuminatus. The full version is coming soon. In the meantime, you can play this WAD while you wait for the full version, and if you can find any problems then please let me know by emailing me, sending me a private message on Doomworld Forums or make a reply to the official thread which is here: http://www.doomworld.com/vb/wads-mods/59990-project-illuminatus-32-level-megawad/
